title: Priti Patel
summary: Priti Sushil Patel[2] (born 29 March 1972) is a British politician who has been serving as Home Secretary since 2019. She previously served as Secretary of State for International Development from 2016 to 2017. A member of the Conservative Party, she has been Member of Parliament (MP) for Witham since 2010. She is ideologically on the right wing of the Conservative Party, and considers herself to be a Thatcherite.
